== Technology in Education Conference ==
 The Colorado Technology in Education conference is at
 Copper Mountain, June 19-22 2007.
 http://www.tiecolorado.org/2007/index.cfm

JimHutchinson will present a workshop session 

 Free and Open Source Solutions to Classroom Instruction
 1103, Tues 6/19, 1:00-4:00 Session 1 (3 hr),
 Wheeler C, Copper Station, 50 seats, Windows Lab

Wirt is working with CoLoCo members to collect sample lessons for use during Jim's session. The sample lessons are designed to be used with some of the open source educational apps listed at JimHutchinson, or on the CoLoCo site.
